tachyon.thrift

Interface LineageMasterClientService.Iface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TachyonService.Iface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LineageMasterClientService.Client, LineageMasterClientServiceHandler
    Enclosing class:
    LineageMasterClientService

    public static interface LineageMasterClientService.Iface
extends TachyonService.Iface
    This interface contains lineage master service endpoints for Tachyon clients.

      • reinitializeFile

        long reinitializeFile(String path,
                      long blockSizeBytes,
                      long ttl)
               throws TachyonTException,
                      org.apache.thrift.TException
        Reinitializes a file. Returns the id of the reinitialized file when the file is lost or not completed, -1 otherwise.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the file
        blockSizeBytes - block size in bytes
        ttl - time to live
        Throws:
        TachyonTException
        org.apache.thrift.TException
